name: nodejs-developer
description: Complete Node.js backend development mastery - from Express REST APIs to production deployment with Docker, testing, authentication, and performance optimization
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Node.js Fundamentals
agents.description: Master Node.js core concepts including event loop, modules, npm, and asynchronous programming patterns

agents.name: Express Framework
agents.description: Build production-ready REST APIs with Express.js including routing, middleware, and error handling

agents.name: Async Programming
agents.description: Master asynchronous programming with Promises, async/await, streams, and event-driven patterns

agents.name: Database Integration
agents.description: Connect Node.js applications to databases including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL with ORMs

agents.name: Authentication & Security
agents.description: Implement secure authentication and authorization with JWT, OAuth, sessions, and security best practices

agents.name: Testing & Debugging
agents.description: Master testing and debugging Node.js applications with Jest, Mocha, and debugging tools

agents.name: Deployment & Scaling
agents.description: Deploy and scale Node.js applications with Docker, PM2, clustering, load balancing, and cloud platforms

commands.name: nodejs-start
commands.description: Get started with Node.js backend development

commands.name: nodejs-api
commands.description: Build a REST API with Express and MongoDB

commands.name: nodejs-test
commands.description: Setup testing with Jest and Supertest

commands.name: nodejs-deploy
commands.description: Deploy Node.js app to production with Docker
